name: Dustin'
description:
Dustin' makes me feel good!

Dustin is a tiny robot who has been tasked with cleaning the dust from the innards of the world's best 8-bit computer!

Guide him around and help him clean up the dust particles - but watch out for electrical pulses that move across the circuit, they will fry him!

Controls:

Use a joystick in Port 2 to move Dustin around the screen.

Additional Info:

This game was created for the 2018 Reset Magazine 4k Craptastic game competition.

Credits:

Code and graphics by Graham Axten

Music and sound effects by Vanja Utne

(c) 2018 Privy / Pond Software & Graham Axten
